software.name: Agent
software.description: Agent software packages provide computers with a degree of intelligence and can carry out any tasks assigned to them that require the use of the Electronics (computers) skill. For example, an Agent package might be told to hack into an enemy computer system and steal a particular data file. They are effectively specialized combinations of Expert Electronics (computers) and less capable Intellect software packages.
software.special: Can carry out any task that uses the Electronics (computers) skill at level 0.

software.name: Agent
software.description: Agent software packages provide computers with a degree of intelligence and can carry out any tasks assigned to them that require the use of the Electronics (computers) skill. software.name: Agent
software.description: Agent software packages provide computers with a degree of intelligence and can carry out any tasks assigned to them that require the use of the Electronics (computers) skill. For example, an Agent package might be told to hack into an enemy computer system and steal a particular data file. They are effectively specialized combinations of Expert Electronics (computers) and less capable Intellect software packages.
software.special: Can carry out any task that uses the Electronics (computers) skill at level 3.

software.name: Database
software.description: This software package is a collection of several databases that can be searched with an Electronics (computers) check or using an Agent package. It automatically updates itself whenever in range of a suitable server or cloud (typically any system of TL9+) and can thus be counted upon to answer any question based upon fact and reference.
software.special: Allows a Traveller to access information based on fact and reference.

software.name: Decryptor
software.description: Decryptor software packages allow a comms operator to analyze intercepted transmissions and decrypt them in real-time. This typically required a Very Difficult (12+) Electronics (comms) check but DM+1 is granted for every TL the transmitting computer or comms device is below the intercepting computer. A further DM+2 is granted if 1D hours is spent analyzing the transmission though this will, of course, no longer be done in real-time. Furthermore, Decryptor packages will be utterly unable to decrypt transmissions made from devices of a higher TL (in theory they can accomplish this, but the time to do so is usually estimated in scales of hundreds or thousands of years).
software.special: Grants DM+1 to an Electronics (comms) check made to decrypt intercepted transmissions for each tech level the transmitter is below the Decryptor, as well as DM+2 if 1D hours is spent analyzing the transmission.

software.name: Digital Friend
software.description: The Digital Friend is an Intelligent interface package that has been given a definable (and adjustable) personality, and is usually given a name by its user. It was designed for Travellers who wanted more 'humanity' in their computers and for those who spent long periods of isolation, such as scouts and belters. Digital Friends are also used for therapeutic purposes and have been useful in resolving long standing mental issues held by many Travellers.
software.special: Gives your computer a personality.

software.name: Expert
software.description: Expert software packages allow a computer to mimic a specific skill - this skill must be specified when the software package is purchased. A Traveller using an Expert package may make a skill check as if he had the skill at level 0. Only INT and EDU-based checks can be attempted, however. If a Traveller already has the skill, then an Expert package will grant DM+1 to his check. However, the package can only help if the difficulty of the task is Difficult (10+) or less.
software.special: The Traveller can use the specified INT or EDU skill at level 0, or gain DM+1 on Difficult (10+) or lower difficulty checks. Requires an Intelligent Interface package.

software.name: Expert
software.description: Expert software packages allow a computer to mimic a specific skill - this skill must be specified when the software package is purchased. A Traveller using an Expert package may make a skill check as if he had the skill at level 1. Only INT and EDU-based checks can be attempted, however. If a Traveller already has the skill, then an Expert package will grant DM+1 to his check. However, the package can only help if the difficulty of the task is Very Difficult (12+) or less.
software.special: The Traveller can use the specified INT or EDU skill at level 0, or gain DM+1 on Very Difficult (12+) or lower difficulty checks. Requires an Intelligent Interface package.

software.name: Expert
software.description: Expert software packages allow a computer to mimic a specific skill - this skill must be specified when the software package is purchased. A Traveller using an Expert package may make a skill check as if he had the skill at level 2. Only INT and EDU-based checks can be attempted, however. If a Traveller already has the skill, then an Expert package will grant DM+1 to his check. However, the package can only help if the difficulty of the task is Formidable (14+) or less.
software.special: The Traveller can use the specified skill at level 2, or gain DM+1 on Formidable (14+) or lower difficulty checks. Requires an Intelligent Interface package.

software.name: Intellect
software.description: An Intellect software package is similar to the more primitive Agent but has a far more advanced intelligence, being able to communicate normally with a Traveller. It is capable of using any Expert package and only use 1 Expert package at a time.
software.special: Can carry out any task that uses the Electronics (computers) skill at level 1. Can also use an Expert package.

software.name: Intellect
software.description: An Intellect software package is similar to the more primitive Agent but has a far more advanced intelligence, being able to communicate normally with a Traveller. It is capable of using any Expert package and can simultaneously use 2 Expert packages.
software.special: Can carry out any task that uses the Electronics (computers) skill at level 2. Can also use up to 2 Expert packages simultaneously.

software.name: Intellect
software.description: An Intellect software package is similar to the more primitive Agent but has a far more advanced intelligence, being able to communicate normally with a Traveller. It is capable of using any Expert package and can simultaneously use 3 Expert packages.
software.special: Can carry out any task that uses the Electronics (computers) skill at level 3. Can also use up to 3 Expert packages simultaneously.

software.name: Intelligent Interface
software.description: This interface package features an artificial intelligence that allows a computer to report data and receive commands as if it were a sentient being. Those familiar with intelligent interfaces will quickly recognize its presence, but a more primitive Traveller could be fooled for a while into thinking it is dealing with a living intelligence. Intelligent interface is required for using an expert software package.
software.special: Allows a Traveller to interact with a computer as if it were an intelligent being. Required for Expert packages.

software.name: Intrusion
software.description: Intrusion software is designed to break through Security packages, allowing users to gain access to computers that would otherwise be off-limits. Because of this, Intrusion software is illegal on many worlds (typically any worlds of Law Level 4+).
software.special: Grants DM+1 to all checks made to electronically hack into a computer.

software.name: Intrusion
software.description: Intrusion software is designed to break through Security packages, allowing users to gain access to computers that would otherwise be off-limits. Because of this, Intrusion software is illegal on many worlds (typically any worlds of Law Level 4+).
software.special: Grants DM+2 to all checks made to electronically hack into a computer.

software.name: Intrusion
software.description: Intrusion software is designed to break through Security packages, allowing users to gain access to computers that would otherwise be off-limits. Because of this, Intrusion software is illegal on many worlds (typically any worlds of Law Level 4+).
software.special: Grants DM+3 to all checks made to electronically hack into a computer.

software.name: Intrusion
software.description: Intrusion software is designed to break through Security packages, allowing users to gain access to computers that would otherwise be off-limits. Because of this, Intrusion software is illegal on many worlds (typically any worlds of Law Level 4+).
software.special: Grants DM+4 to all checks made to electronically hack into a computer.

software.name: Personal Trainer
software.description: Often created from a modified Digital Friend package, the Personal Trainer is a dedicated package intended to aid the education of a Traveller. Its use grants DM+1 to all checks made to gain or improve skills during post career education, but a new package has to be purchased for each new skill being studied.
software.special: Grants DM+1 to all checks made to gain or improve skills during post career education.

software.name: Security
software.description: The purpose of a Security package is to defend against hackers and other attempts at intrusion, providing an effective firewall tha keeps the other packages upon the computer safe from interference. The ability of Security to defend itself is represented by the difficulty of the Electronics (computers) check required to bypass it, which improves with the complexity of the Security package.
software.special: Requires a Difficult (10+) Electronics (computers) check to bypass.

software.name: Security
software.description: The purpose of a Security package is to defend against hackers and other attempts at intrusion, providing an effective firewall tha keeps the other packages upon the computer safe from interference. The ability of Security to defend itself is represented by the difficulty of the Electronics (computers) check required to bypass it, which improves with the complexity of the Security package.
software.special: Requires a Very Difficult (12+) Electronics (computers) check to bypass.

software.name: Security
software.description: The purpose of a Security package is to defend against hackers and other attempts at intrusion, providing an effective firewall tha keeps the other packages upon the computer safe from interference. The ability of Security to defend itself is represented by the difficulty of the Electronics (computers) check required to bypass it, which improves with the complexity of the Security package.
software.special: Requires a Formidable (14+) Electronics (computers) check to bypass.

software.name: Security
software.description: The purpose of a Security package is to defend against hackers and other attempts at intrusion, providing an effective firewall tha keeps the other packages upon the computer safe from interference. The ability of Security to defend itself is represented by the difficulty of the Electronics (computers) check required to bypass it, which improves with the complexity of the Security package.
software.special: Requires an Impossible (16+) Electronics (computers) check to bypass.

software.name: Translator
software.description: Translator packages are effectively specialized Expert software that only utilize Language skills. Provides a near real-time translation of all common languages expected to be found in the area of space from which they originated, and can automatically update upon arriving at any TL9 or better world.
software.special: Provides a near real-time translation of all common languages.

software.name: Translator
software.description: Translator packages are effectively specialized Expert software that only utilize Language skills. Provides a more accurate, absolute real-time translation of all common languages expected to be found in the area of space from which they originated, and can automatically update upon arriving at any TL9 or better world.
software.special: Provides a more accurate, absolute real-time translation of all common languages.

software.name: Universal Translator
software.description: The Universal Translator package comprises very sophisticated software that allows the real-time analysis of both written and spoken languages. Using a massive database of known languages and multi-tiered algorithms, even previously unknown languages can usually be translated.
software.special: Provides a real-time translation of almost any language, written or spoken. Applies also to languages never before encountered.
